about.title: About me
about.description: With more than 4 years of experience in web development following a professional reconversion, I can now offer my services as a Full stack web developer. Reliable and able to work independently as well as in a team, I have a good capacity of analysis and a real initiative in the resolution of problems. My adaptability allows me to work in a team and to answer your web challenges, whether they are mono-product or multi-product in Agile / Scrum mode.

items.title: Mes événements emploi
items.baseline: All Pôle emploi advisors offer events in sectors that are recruiting on the My job events website. This service allows jobseekers to prepare, train, get information and be recruited by registering in one click for the event that corresponds to their needs, in complete autonomy!

items.title: Salons en ligne de recrutement
items.baseline: Pôle emploi's e-recruitment platform. Simple and fast, the web application allows job seekers to apply and meet recruiters without having to go anywhere!

items.title: TradEmploi
items.baseline: Instant translation service to help advisers welcome non-English speaking applicants, accessible from the advisers' desk, which integrates an artificial intelligence that translates and then allows the adviser to synthesise it back into the applicant's language.

backend: Google Cloud (Cloud Functions, Text-to-Speech, Speech-to-Text, Translation AI)

items.title: La bonne compétence pro
items.baseline: Online service that allows recruiters to locate in 3 clicks, job seekers who have recently been trained or are currently training in a skill they are looking for. It is possible to locate training courses by region, department or town.

items.title: Reactive world map
items.baseline: Presentation of an animated world map according to the country selected thanks to the data collected by the Leaflet.js API

items.title: Real-time communications - WebRTC
items.baseline: Web application with 3 communication options: written exchange, video exchange or voice exchange with written transcription.

services.title: Skills
services.app-web-content: Creation of business applications, Intranet, Extranet, Corporate and showcase sites, Web apps...
services.responsive-content: Use of HTML5 / CSS3 technologies to create adaptive designs. Use of Bootstrap / Material UI frameworks to facilitate implementation and increase productivity
services.architecture-content: MVC design pattern to separate the layers and avoid "spaghetti" code. Object oriented programming / PDO for MySQL / AJAX / Jquery / Javascript / WebService RestFul JSON ...
services.code-content: To facilitate its recovery and maintainability. My priorities: KISS / DRY. Contribution to the writing of simple technical documentation.
services.seo-accessibility-content: Use of Google Analytics / Adsense / Adwords / Tanaguru tools. Application of SEO and digital accessibility rules and best practices.
services.team-content: Know how to listen, exchange and help each other to progress together (Scrum, Jira, Git, GitLab, Confluence...).

items.name: Daniel S.
items.review: I enjoyed working with Nicolas. He delivers good quality of code and doesn(t hesitate to share it. He communicates very well with our team and products owners. He participates in meetings and discussions too. Also, he has good ideas to improve our team and Pole emploi environment. Overall, all good 👍
